context.p: On the Delete service definition page, you can delete an existing technical service. If marketable services exist for the technical service, or if there are active subscriptions, it cannot be deleted.
You can delete a service definition if you have the technology manager user role, and your organization is registered as a technology provider.

step.cmd: Select the technical service to be deleted, and click Delete.

taskbody.result: The service is deleted. A technical service definition XML file is not deleted physically, and you can import it again on demand.
